name: Eagle
description: An eagle is a small bird of prey with sharp talons and exceptional eyesight, known for its graceful flight and hunting prowess.
memorable: Exceptional vision makes it a formidable scout and observer.
goals: Hunts small mammals, fish, and birds, often serves as a scout.
relations: Related to other birds of prey, can be companions to adventurers.
environment: Often found in wild areas, soaring through the sky or near water.
strengths: Keen eyesight provides advantage on sight-based perception checks.
weaknesses: Low hit points and poor strength makes it vulnerable in combat.
attacks: Talons attack delivers minimal slashing damage but allows for defensive capability.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Sight grants advantage on Perception checks involving sight.
senses: Has a passive Perception score of 14, indicating sharp awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Perception, enhancing its ability to notice fine details.
additional_information: Can swim up to 30 feet, but sinks if not careful.
Can serve as a valuable scout for adventurers.
Known for fierce defense of its nest.
Represents strength and freedom in various cultures.
Can fly at impressive speeds for its size.
test_queries: bird of prey with keen eyesight
nimble small creature suitable for reconnaissance
agile flying predator that hunts small animals
small beast with sharp talons and good perception
creature known for speed and observation skills
